An emoji guide for my commit messages

⭐ GitHub 𝕏 Share

Begin a project.

Add a dependency.

Introduce new features quietly.

Introduce new features boldly.

Simple fix for a non-critical issue.

Fix my own bugs.

I've been watching your struggles all along. You really worked hard, didn't you? Finally, your patience will be rewarded with massive bug fixes.

Deploy stuff.

Improve structure / format of the code.

Refactor code.

Remove code or files.

Critical hotfix.

Add or update the UI and style files.

Add or update timeless documentation.

Add a flaky test.

End the project.
